name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
key_benefits: Unrivaled ecosystem: If a problem exists, there's a React library for it.
Virtual DOM ensures smooth updates even in complex functional UIs.
Reusable component architecture drastically reduces technical debt over time.

name: Next.js
description: The React Framework for the Web.
key_benefits: Hybrid Rendering: Mix Static (SSG) and Server-Side (SSR) pages for optimal speed.
Automatic Image Optimization & Font hosting out of the box.
Zero-config routing system that scales from blog to enterprise e-commerce.

name: Vue.js
key_benefits: Gentlest learning curve: You can understand a Vue component in minutes.
Two-way data binding simplifies form handling significantly.
Single-File Components (HTML/CSS/JS) keep code strictly organized.

name: FastAPI
description: High performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready for production.
key_benefits: Native Async support: Handles thousands of concurrent connections (like Node.js) but with Python.
Automatic API Documentation: Generates Swagger UI without writing a single line of extra code.
Pydantic integration guarantees data validation is never an afterthought.

name: Django
description: The web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.
key_benefits: Batteries-included: Auth, Admin panel, and ORM are built-in, saving weeks of setup.
Battle-tested security: Protects against SQL injection and XSS by default.
Mature ecosystem perfect for content-heavy or enterprise applications.

name: Express.js (Node.js)
description: Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js.
key_benefits: Single Language: Share logic (and types) between Frontend and Backend.
Massive NPM registry: Access to millions of packages for any functionality.
Non-blocking I/O makes it ideal for real-time chats and streaming services.

name: PostgreSQL
description: The World's Most Advanced Open Source Relational Database.
key_benefits: JSONB support: Gives you the flexibility of NoSQL with the reliability of a Relational DB.
PostGIS extension makes it the gold standard for geospatial data.
Rock-solid ACID compliance protects your most critical financial data.

name: MongoDB
key_benefits: Schema-less design: Iterate on your data model instantly without migrations.
Horizontal Scaling: Sharding is built-in, making it trivial to scale to petabytes.
Native JSON storage matches your API data structure perfectly.

name: Redis
description: In-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache, and message broker.
key_benefits: Sub-millisecond latency: The fastest way to read marketing/session data.
Versatile data structures: Lists, Sets, and Hashes allow for complex caching strategies.
Pub/Sub features enable lightweight real-time messaging.

name: Raspberry Pi 4
key_benefits: Full Linux Environment: Run Python, Docker, and Web Servers natively on the edge.
GPIO Pins: Direct physical control over sensors, motors, and lights.
Massive community support ensuring drivers exist for almost any peripheral.

name: Arduino Uno
description: Open-source electronics platform based on easy-to-use hardware and software.
key_benefits: Real-time processing: No OS latency, perfect for precise timing tasks.
Extremely low power consumption for battery-operated devices.
Rugged and simple: Harder to 'brick' than a complex Linux computer.

name: Docker
description: Develop, ship, and run applications in containers.
key_benefits: Eliminates 'It works on my machine': Consistent environment dev-to-prod.
Microservices ready: Isolate services cleanly without dependency conflicts.
Instant rollback: Revert to a previous image hash in seconds if deployment fails.

name: GitHub Actions
description: Automate your workflow from idea to production.
key_benefits: Integrated with code: Define pipelines in YAML right next to your source.
Matrix builds: Test across Node 14/16/18 and Python 3.9/3.10 simultaneously.
Marketplace: Drop-in actions for AWS, Docker, and npm publishing.
